name: Lonely Ghosts
description:
This is my 1st game jam and game release after years of procrastinating and playing around with programming. Although the game has no content I will release it because I swore to myself to release the game no matter what happens . Please don't expect anything.  This is the start of me being productive by joining various game jams. 

I might recreate this if I feel like it and release it as a full fledged game. Anyway please don't play this.
